title: Landscape with River
briefDescription: Oil painting depicting a river scene at sunset with mountains in the background. The work shows the influence of Impressionism in its handling of light and color.

title: Bronze Figure
briefDescription: Standing human figure in bronze depicting a traditional dancer. The sculpture captures movement through dynamic pose and flowing lines.

title: Decorated Vase
briefDescription: Traditional ceramic vase with geometric patterns in earth tones. The design incorporates traditional Zulu motifs.

title: Woven Blanket
briefDescription: Traditional wool blanket with intricate geometric patterns. Made using traditional Xhosa weaving techniques passed down through generations.

title: Portrait of Chief
briefDescription: Black and white portrait photograph of a traditional chief in ceremonial dress. High-quality gelatin silver print showing excellent tonal range.
